text:
KAMCORD http://www.kamcord.com | SF, CA | ONSITE

Lead iOS Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/kamcord/0fceba21-e4c1-43c0-afbd-81c106...

iOS Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/kamcord/8480c014-d88c-4d2a-8286-2b99c9...

Android Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/kamcord/054e810f-fc88-46ea-9b50-65e9c9...

Kamcord is building a social network centered around gameplay videos for the world’s 1 billion mobile gamers. Using the world’s first mobile gameplay recording and sharing technology, we reach hundreds of millions of mobile devices a month.
